feed.title: SWAG Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for SWAG: 4.1.1-ls395
entry.content:
CI Report:

N/A

LinuxServer Changes:

Disable Certbot's built in log rotation.

Remote Changes:

Updating PIP version of certbot to 4.1.1

entry.title: New release for SWAG: 4.1.1-ls396
entry.content:
CI Report:

N/A

LinuxServer Changes:

Rebase to Alpine 3.22 with PHP 8.4. Add QUIC support. Drop PHP bindings for mcrypt as it is no longer maintained.

Remote Changes:

Updating PIP version of certbot to 4.1.1
